actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT 
payments.retailer_code as retailer_code,
payments.retailer_code as Company_code,
payments.payment_id as payment_id, 
payments.payment_ticket_status as payment_ticket_status,
payments.payment_type as payment_type,
payments.payment_mode as payment_mode, 
payments.payment_status as payment_status,
ret.cleared_installation_payment as INS_PMT_Sts,
payments.amount_paid as amount_paid, 
payments.taxable_amt as taxable_amt,
payments.gst_amt as gst_amt,
payments.transaction_id as transaction_id, 
to_char(payments.transaction_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as transaction_date,  
payments.payment_source as payment_source,
to_char(payments.payment_start_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as payment_start_date,
to_char(payments.payment_end_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as payment_end_date,
payments.payment_clearance_status as payment_clearance_status, 
payments.payment_received_by as payment_received_by,
payments.remarks as remarks,
payments.created_time, 
payments.created_by as created_by, 
payments.deleted as deleted,  
payments.updated_time, 
payments.updated_by as updated_by,  
to_char(payments.payment_clear_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') as payment_clear_date,
payments.accounts_remarks as accounts_remarks,
payments.invoice_sent_status as invoice_sent_status, 
payments.invoice_no as invoice_no,
offer.offer_code as offer_code,
ret.amc as retailer_amc_amt,
ret.installation_amount as retailer_inst_amt
FROM payments as payments 
left join retailer ret on ret.retailer_code = payments.retailer_code
left join retailer_offers as offer on offer.offer_id=payments.offer_id
where coalesce(payments.deleted,false)=false 
and 
payments.payment_ticket_status!='OPEN'
and 
to_char(payments.created_time,'yyyy-mm-dd 00:00:000') >=
to_char(date({{from_date.formattedDate}}),'yyyy-mm-dd 00:00:000')
and  
to_char(payments.created_time,'yyyy-mm-dd 23:59:999')<=
to_char(date({{to_date.formattedDate}}),'yyyy-mm-dd 23:59:999')
AND 
(case when coalesce({{Retailer_code_in.text}},'')='' then 1=1 else upper(payments.retailer_code)=upper(coalesce({{Retailer_code_in.text}},'')) end)
;
